title: ""
format:
  typst:
    papersize: us-letter
    margin:
      top: 0.75in
      bottom: 0.75in
      left: 1in
      right: 1in
    fontsize: 11pt

---

```{=typst}
// InfoSci Memo Header
#set text(font: "Georgia", size: 11pt)

// UA Brand Colors
#let ua-blue = rgb("#0C234B")
#let ua-red = rgb("#AB0520")

// Header with logo
#grid(
  columns: (1fr, 1fr),
  align: (left, right),
  [#image("assets/infosci-logo.png", width: 2.5in)],
  [
    #align(right)[
      #text(size: 24pt, weight: "bold", fill: ua-blue)[MEMORANDUM]
    ]
  ]
)

#v(0.1in)
#line(length: 100%, stroke: 2pt + ua-red)
#v(0.25in)

// Memo Fields
#grid(
  columns: (0.8in, 1fr),
  row-gutter: 0.15in,
  [#text(weight: "bold")[TO:]],
  [[Recipient Name, Title]],
  [#text(weight: "bold")[FROM:]],
  [[Your Name, Title]],
  [#text(weight: "bold")[DATE:]],
  [#datetime.today().display("[month repr:long] [day], [year]")],
  [#text(weight: "bold")[RE:]],
  [[Subject of Memo]],
)

#v(0.1in)
#line(length: 100%, stroke: 0.5pt + ua-blue)
#v(0.3in)
```

[Opening paragraph stating the purpose of the memo clearly and concisely.]

[Body paragraphs providing necessary details, background information, or analysis. Use clear headings if the memo covers multiple topics.]

[Closing paragraph with any required actions, deadlines, or next steps.]
